column4: Hello all.  No matter how many linux distros I try out, I always come back to Ubuntu.  Nice to be here :)
Does anyone know how Ubuntu will react if I try to recompile my kernel?  There seems to be a lot of modules I do not need, so I'm sure there's plenty of things built in I don't need.
should play nicely with it, but could be replaced by updating packages.
I agree with Jack_Sparrow. The gain in performance doesn't outweigh the time and effort for the compiling the source for simply the performance boost.
